trans-unit.source: Manage Azure Traffic Manager using Azure Automation
trans-unit.target: Manage Azure Traffic Manager using Azure Automation

trans-unit.source: Learn about how the Azure Automation service can be used to manage Azure Traffic Manager.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how the Azure Automation service can be used to manage Azure Traffic Manager.

trans-unit.source: Managing Azure Traffic Manager using Azure Automation
trans-unit.target: Managing Azure Traffic Manager using Azure Automation

trans-unit.source: This guide will introduce you to the Azure Automation service, and how it can be used to simplify management of Azure Traffic Manager.
trans-unit.target: This guide will introduce you to the Azure Automation service, and how it can be used to simplify management of Azure Traffic Manager.

trans-unit.source: [Azure Automation](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/automation/) is an Azure service for simplifying cloud management through process automation.
trans-unit.target: [Azure Automation](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/automation/) is an Azure service for simplifying cloud management through process automation.

trans-unit.source: Using Azure Automation, long-running, manual, error-prone, and frequently repeated tasks can be automated to increase reliability, efficiency, and time to value for your organization.
trans-unit.target: Using Azure Automation, long-running, manual, error-prone, and frequently repeated tasks can be automated to increase reliability, efficiency, and time to value for your organization.

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation provides a highly-reliable and highly-available workflow execution engine that scales to meet your needs as your organization grows.
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation provides a highly-reliable and highly-available workflow execution engine that scales to meet your needs as your organization grows.

trans-unit.source: In Azure Automation, processes can be kicked off manually, by 3rd-party systems, or at scheduled intervals so that tasks happen exactly when needed.
trans-unit.target: In Azure Automation, processes can be kicked off manually, by 3rd-party systems, or at scheduled intervals so that tasks happen exactly when needed.

trans-unit.source: Lower operational overhead and free up IT / DevOps staff to focus on work that adds business value by moving your cloud management tasks to be run automatically by Azure Automation.
trans-unit.target: Lower operational overhead and free up IT / DevOps staff to focus on work that adds business value by moving your cloud management tasks to be run automatically by Azure Automation.

trans-unit.source: How can Azure Automation help manage Azure Traffic Manager?
trans-unit.target: How can Azure Automation help manage Azure Traffic Manager?

trans-unit.source: Traffic Manager can be managed in Azure Automation by using the PowerShell cmdlets that are available in the [Azure PowerShell tools](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/jj156055.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Traffic Manager can be managed in Azure Automation by using the PowerShell cmdlets that are available in the [Azure PowerShell tools](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/jj156055.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation can call these PowerShell cmdlets, so that you can perform all of your Traffic Manager management tasks within the service.
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation can call these PowerShell cmdlets, so that you can perform all of your Traffic Manager management tasks within the service.

trans-unit.source: You can also pair these cmdlets in Azure Automation with the cmdlets for other Azure services, to automate complex tasks across Azure services and 3rd party systems.
trans-unit.target: You can also pair these cmdlets in Azure Automation with the cmdlets for other Azure services, to automate complex tasks across Azure services and 3rd party systems.

trans-unit.source: Now that you've learned the basics of Azure Automation and how it can be used to manage Azure Traffic Manager, follow these links to learn more about Azure Automation.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've learned the basics of Azure Automation and how it can be used to manage Azure Traffic Manager, follow these links to learn more about Azure Automation.

trans-unit.source: Check out the Azure Automation [Getting Started Guide](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=390560)
trans-unit.target: Check out the Azure Automation [Getting Started Guide](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=390560)
